items.name: Add-in with notification toast
items.description: Highlights the currently-selected range, and reports its address via a Fabric-based notification toast.

items.name: Document-object to DOM interaction
items.description: Lists all of the tables in the workbook, and creates clickable hyperlinks to activate the tables even after the initial "Excel.run" has finished.

items.name: Report-generation
items.description: Writes data to the workbook, applies basic formatting, and adds a chart bound to the data.
